summary: A musical, stop-motion adaptation of the well-known movie, Buddy, a human raised in the north pole, goes to New York to find his family.
cast: Jim Parsons|Mark Hamill|Rachael MacFarlane|Max Charles|Kate Micucci|Gilbert Gottfried|Jay Leno|Fred Armisen|Steve Higgins|Matt Lauer|Edward Asner|Rachel Bloom|Larry Dorf|Rachel Ramras|Kevin Michael Richardson|Kevin Shinick
title: Elf: Buddy's Musical Christmas
